refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Similar to [1]lcaNewMonitorValue but instead of returning the status of monitored PVs this routine blocks until all PVs have fresh data available (e.g., due to initial connection or changes in value and/or severity status). Reading the actual data must be done using [2]lcaGet.

listitem.para: m x 1 cell- matrix) of m strings.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting:
try lcaNewMonitorWait(pvs) vals = lcaGet(pvs) catch errs = lcaLastError() handleErrors(errs) end __________________________________________________________________
